name: YouDontMoveWhileAttacking
description:
this game is just an idea I had in mind for like, a day... Tell me what you think on twitter: https://twitter.com/Igilapigi

(I have never used twitter before and don't even know where you will end up by clicking on that link)

arrow keys : walk/jump

space: attack

ctrl: restart

oh and btw! I need some sounds effects and music, if someone is up for making some I'll be happy, and ofcourse will include your name at the start/end of the game in the next version (if you want to)

and sorry for the messy description, I just don't feel like putting effort into it right now :/
